title: Remediating Entitlement Creep
description: An access review reveals a long-term employee has accumulated access from multiple previous roles that they no longer need ('entitlement creep'). An analyst must remediate this.

tasks.description: Receive the results of the access review, which flags the user for having excessive permissions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst has the list of the user's current, excessive permissions.

tasks.description: Compare the user's current permissions against the standard permissions for their current role.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst identifies a specific list of permissions that should be revoked.

tasks.description: Revoke all unnecessary permissions, bringing the user's access in line with the principle of least privilege.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully cleans up the user's permissions, reducing risk.
